articles.title: Watch: Young Virat Kohli Fangirl From Ladakh Leaves Internet Awestruck With Her Brilliant Batting Skills - NDTV
articles.description: A young girl from Ladakh attracted the limelight after a video of her brilliantly batting in her school surfaced on social media.
articles.content:
Internet users lauded the schoolgirl for her attachment to the game.
